document.full_text: watching the stage adaptation of 'autumn sonata' at the yale repertory theater is a bit like looking at the ingmar bergman movie through the wrong end of a telescope.
document.title: theater review | 'autumn sonata': a fraught mother-daughter drama
lines_and_colors: watching the stage adaptation of 'autumn sonata' at the yale repertory theater is a bit like looking at the ingmar bergman movie through the wrong end of a telescope.
